OOC: This reply is for Airly and Preston at the base, combining the two.

B=
IC:

Just as Tucson nearly slips off for a short intimate moment with Talon=
, he gets the call from Lord Elder back at the Ark.  Caught a bit awkwardly=
, he replies.

"Oh, Lord Elder, thanks for the report.  I'm sure Nightshift=
 is in control of his situation and if anything does go wrong I have confid=
ence that he'll do the right thing.  I say let him move in slowly to reduce=
 the amount of suspicion.. And I was just on my - way to interrogate Nights=
trike..  I feel that if I can get an angle from the Unicronian's side I may=
 be able to piece everything together..."

He could not keep his mind off o=
f Talon.  His heart beating twice as fast as before.  Yet he tries to keep =
his composure while conversing with Lord Elder.

" I know this is a bit of =
a shot in the dark, and if it doesn't work, it doesn't work.  But I'm almos=
t certain that if I can get the full scope of what's going on, I may be abl=
e to take care of things on all fronts, or at least meet with everyone to s=
ee how we can all remedy this situation.  It's gonna be a group effort but =
any information I can get, will help us immensely.  All right thats it in a=
 lugnut Lord Elder, I'm off - to question Nighstrike.. Tucson Prime out."

=
He looks to Talon.

"Now, where were we?  Oh, I remember..  I - don't think=
 they'll mind if we take a little detour..."

He finds a storage room and o=
pens the door to it, gently escorting Talon inside.  As he had done with Ni=
ghtstrike, he closes the door so they can be alone.

" Sorry, this is the b=
est I can do as far as privacy.  I have to admit, I've never actually spent=
 time alone with anyone...  Wow, I've heard of power surges but I've never =
had any quite like the ones - I'm having now.." 

Without completely thinki=
ng, and giving in to his passion for Talon, Tucson takes Talon into his arm=
s and gives her a kiss on her lips and holds here there for a good long tim=
e in an intimate embrace.  All the while the tires on his ankles spinning i=
n elation.  

Rat Trap hears a slight tire screech coming from the storage =
closet.

" Ahh, the sound of screechn' tires.  Love is in the air."

He dar=
ts up to Depthcharge and the others.

" Um, wait up fellas, I think Wheels'=
n Talon took a little detour.  They should be along shorty."

Without knowi=
ng, Tucson had not fully closed off his com link to Lord Elder, as the soun=
d of the screech of his tires reaches the base with a bit of a "Screee."


=


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Preston Carroll <supercyclonus@...> wrote:=

: Legacy

> Legacy stoo=
d watching the form of Nightstrike, his single optic
> pulsing impassively =
for a moment as if trying to decide what to do
> with the Minion. He steppe=
d over to his to examine him carefully, and
> ensure that his restraints we=
re still in place. With a click he
> secured them in place and then straigh=
tened.
> 
> "Tuscon Prime." Legacy's cold voice intoned over an encrypted A=
utobot
> channel, "I am at Nightstike's location. He is unconscious, I will=

> attempt to wake him."
> 
> Legacy looked down at Nightstike as he nudged=
 him with the canon that
> served as his left arm. "Awaken." he said in col=
d imperious tones, "It
> would seem that you have questions to answer."
